name: maternal
content:

behaving or feeling in the way that a mother does towards her child, especially in a kind, loving way: maternal instincts She is very maternal towards her employees. Compare
paternal
related to a mother's side of the family: Her maternal grandmother (= mother's mother) is still alive.
